unnormalised: CBSE Class 10th results are expected to be announced by 15/05/2024, according to sources at the board. Students from schools across India, including DPS RK Puram and Kendriya Vidyalaya Sangathan, are eagerly awaiting their scores. This year's exams saw participation from over 21 lakh candidates.
normalised: C-B-S-E Class tenth results are expected to be announced by fifteenth May two thousand and twenty four, according to sources at the board. Students from schools across India, including D-P-S R-K Puram and Kendriya Vidyalaya Sangathan, are eagerly awaiting their scores. This year's exams saw participation from over twenty one lakh candidates.

unnormalised: The evaluation process involved examiners from various states, ensuring fairness and consistency in marking. The pass percentage is expected to be around 90%, similar to last year's trend, though final numbers are still being compiled. Students can check their results on the official CBSE website, cbseresults.nic.in, using their roll number and date of birth.
normalised: The evaluation process involved examiners from various states, ensuring fairness and consistency in marking. The pass percentage is expected to be around ninety percent, similar to last year's trend, though final numbers are still being compiled. Students can check their results on the official C-B-S-E website, c-b-s-e-results dot n-i-c dot in, using their roll number and date of birth.

unnormalised: "All the best, bachchon!" exclaimed Mrs. Sharma, a teacher at Ryan International, as she encouraged her students. Several coaching centers are also gearing up to provide counseling and support to students who may need guidance in choosing their streams for Class 11th. Expect cut-offs for Science to remain high, especially at top colleges in Delhi University, around 95%.
normalised: "All the best, bachchon!" exclaimed Missus Sharma, a teacher at Ryan International, as she encouraged her students. Several coaching centers are also gearing up to provide counseling and support to students who may need guidance in choosing their streams for Class eleventh.
